metadata.feature_description: Test interactive UI elements including inline editing, animations, and real-time validation.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click row to expand inline edit form

steps.action: Clicked on 'Number of logins' row in Influence table
steps.expected: Inline edit form should expand below the row with slide down animation
steps.actual: Inline edit form expanded showing Goal Type dropdown, Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value fields, Cancel and Save buttons. Row highlighted in teal color.

steps.action: Expanded inline edit form by clicking row
steps.actual: Form appeared with slide down animation (400ms as per code)

steps.action: Clicked the same row again to collapse
steps.actual: Form collapsed with slide up animation (200ms as per code). Row returned to normal display.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test Save button text changes to Saving...

steps.action: Clicked Save button on inline edit form with valid data
steps.expected: Button text should change to 'Saving...' during save operation
steps.actual: Save operation completed successfully. Code confirms btn.html(utility.resx.CommunitySettings.btn_Saving) is called. The text change is momentary and reverts to 'Save' after API response.

steps.action: Set Min Value to 200 (greater than Max Value of 100) and clicked Save
steps.expected: Validation error should appear indicating Min Value must be less than or equal to Max Value
steps.actual: Red error tooltip/indicator appeared between Min Value and Max Value fields showing validation failed for 'minlessthanmax' rule
Toast notification appeared with 'Item successfully saved.' message and success icon. Toast auto-dismissed after a few seconds.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify confirmation dialog for delete operations

steps.action: Clicked Remove/Delete button on an influence goal row
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear asking user to confirm deletion
steps.actual: Modal dialog appeared with orange warning icon, message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?', Cancel button, and Delete button
Dialog dismissed and item remained in the list

observations: The 'Saving...' button text change happens very quickly (during API call) and reverts immediately after response, making it difficult to capture in screenshots. The functionality is confirmed by code review.
Code review confirms slideUp(200ms) and slideDown(400ms) jQuery animations are used for expand/collapse effects.
The Community Settings page does not have separate tabs - it displays Influence section and Miscellaneous Community Settings section on a single scrollable panel.
Keyboard navigation and accessibility testing was not performed as this is a Medium priority feature and basic UI scenarios were prioritized.
Responsive layout testing was not performed as browser was set to 1280x720 standard viewport.
